column2:
"<%me>, thanks for coming.
I take it you understand the objective?"
"Right, knowing who you are, that question was probably unnecessary."
"Alright, let's get going. Our quest won't wait while we make small talk."
"Sorry for the complete lack of an explanation."
"Well, officially, we're investigating the Dragonkin like normal, but..."

"It looks like Professor Aki has something else in mind...
I hope it doesn't get out of control, like last time."
"If that happens, then we may need to grab her and retreat."
"<%me>, would you mind following my instructions in annihilating the Darkers?"
"I want to test a hypothesis on how the Darkers particles interact with the environment, so try to destroy as many as possible."
"As the situation develops on the battlefield, I'll leave it to your discretion."
